pyntacle.report.reporter module¶

this module handles all the reporting regarding pyntacle

class pyntacleReporter(graph: igraph.Graph, graph2=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This method creates a report according to the type of analysis run by pyntacle

report_global_topology(attributes_list: list)[source]¶

Create a report (as a list) containing all the global attributes list requested

Parameters:

Report all the requested topological indices for the requested nodes

Parameters:
